Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
From: Iron Raptor <ironraptor13@...>



* Iron Raptor was surprised when Ramhorn suddenly appeared and began shooting at Dracona, as well as when Plintissa and her dragon friend began shooting at Ramhorn.
The words in which came out of Ramhorn's mouth seemed nothing more then murmurs over the gunfire, the same as Plintissa's and Dracona's.
But this was hardly the time to begin a war over something that she didn't even understand, but she knew a way to make things a little more clear.
Iron Raptor then stepped out from behind the bots who seemed to protect her, looking straight at Ramhorn and then Plintissa.*

" Second Beast Mode!"

* Now in her two story form Iron Raptor looked down at all of them, she had to stop this battle to get any clear sense out of everyone.
Without even thinking twice she moved to a position that that brought herself to stand between the battling forces, lowering her body then between the two so that their last shots hit her instead of each other. A natural barricade, protecting both sides from each other, thus stopping the battle and from anyone getting hurt any further.
She  felt the last shots hit her sides but she really didn't care, the roar from her mouth said that there was to be no more fighting.*

" ENOUGH!!!"

* With that said she then turned her massive head towards Ramhorn, not a mean or misunderstanding expression on her face. Then turning her head towards Dracona and Plintissa with the same expression.*

" We're going to discuss this situation without further interruption with weapons if it kills me! Now calm down before I have to slag all three of you!"

* With that she then looked back over at Ramhorn.*

" Now, what's all this I hear about Stinkbomb's murder?"
